author: Shirley Pedersen
title: Comment on Donald Trump & Peeing Prostitutes: 5 Funny Memes About ‘Peegate’ by Shirley Pedersen
text: Donald Trump & Peeing Prostitutes: 5 Funny Memes About ‘Peegate’ Published Updated 4:06 pm EST, January 11, 2017 1 Comment By S.J. Prince 42.7k Share Tweet Follow An unverified report published by BuzzFeed claims that President-Elect Donald Trump hired Russian prostitutes to participate in "golden showers" while he watched. The claim was made in a complete dossier about unverified claims against Trump and his relationship with Russia. It was published by BuzzFeed News and had been passed among journalists months prior to its publication. The pee play allegedly happened during a 2013 trip by Trump to Moscow, where he stayed at the Ritz Carlton’s Presidential Suite where President Obama had previously stayed. According to the report, Trump hired Russian prostitutes to perform golden showers in the bed for him. The internet immediately went crazy with the allegations and created the above and following memes. (Twitter) Next Image: img_0383 S.J. Prince lives in New York City and is a senior contributor to Heavy. In his free time he enjoys travel and yoga. January 11, 2017 4:06 pm
